intro: Psychotria hancorniifolia, commonly known as the red-eyed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to Central and South America, particularly found in tropical rainforests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and striking red flowers with prominent yellow stamens. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of dense forests. Psychotria hancorniifolia is also known for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
